question.title: Hibernate @SoftDelete problem with @ManyToOne(fetch = FetchType.LAZY)
question.body:
I am trying to implement soft delete feature using hibernate (6.4.1.Final) @SoftDelete annotation and I am encountering problem with @ManyToOne(fetch = FetchType.LAZY) on the given referenced soft-deletable entity.

Stating:

To-one attribute (com.example.EntityA.referencedEntityB) cannot be mapped as LAZY as its associated entity is defined with @SoftDelete

My question is: Why is it not possible to have the referenced entity to be lazy loaded if it is soft-deletable?

I tried to search the answer in hibernate issue tracker, but with no success.
